channel.title: How do i change the spawn point?
channel.description: Ok well i dont like the current place the characters spwan at. How do i change the spawn point? :confused:

item.title: How do i change the spawn point?
item.dc:creator: @mopar_I mopar I
item.description:
@mopar_I wrote:

First, go to player.java, search:

teleport

You should see something like this:

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 2539;//3072; teleportToY = 4716;//3312;

On the TeleportToX and Y change the coordinates after it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the spawn point?
